title: John Harvey-Darkness and Light
description:
Former cop Frank Elder is drawn out of retirement when his ex-wife asks him to look into the disappearance of her friend JennieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sister Claire in Nottingham. Elder reluctantly returns to the city where his family disintegrated.
Elder uncovers sexual secrets of ClaireÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s that take Jennie by surprise. But when Claire is found dead at homeÃ¢â‚¬â€unmarked and carefully dressedÃ¢â‚¬â€it is Elder who is surprised by the similarities to an old case. To solve this riddle, Elder will have to repartner with Detective Inspector Maureen Prior and delve into several suspectsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ traumatic histories.
In a case in which neither memories, confessions, nor instincts can be trusted, Elder struggles with the weight of the past and Harvey delivers another psychologically trenchant page-turner
